text: The pizza was amazing, but a bit too salty.
The staff was friendly, but the wait was long.
I loved the dessert, it was the highlight of the meal.
The portion was too small for the price.
The ambiance was great, perfect for a casual dinner.
The pasta was bland and lacked flavor.
The steak was cooked to perfection, very tender.
I didn't enjoy the soup, it was too cold.
The restaurant was clean and well-maintained.
The drinks were overpriced, but the food was good.
